name: Groceries & Meals
description: Jones Memorial United Methodist Church provides a free hot lunch every Wednesday and free groceries every Saturday. Lunches are distributed on Wednesdays and groceries are distributed on Saturdays. Availability may be waitlist only.
fullDescription: Jones Memorial United Methodist Church provides a free hot lunch every Wednesday and free groceries every Saturday. Lunches are distributed on Wednesdays and groceries are distributed on Saturdays. Availability may be waitlist only.
whatTheyOffer: Jones Memorial United Methodist Church provides a free hot lunch every Wednesday and free groceries every Saturday. Lunches are distributed on Wednesdays and groceries are distributed on Saturdays. Availability may be waitlist only.
howToGetIt: To enroll: - Call 415-921-7653 for more information on how to get free lunch or groceries - Email office@jonesumc.com(email address is currently offline, please call for more information) (General Information) - Go in person to sign up for free lunch or groceries. Bring a bag for your groceries. Jones Memorial United Methodist Church 1975 Post St. San Francisco, CA 94115
